template_default.title: Embed maker
description: *error messages when a link or color is invalid don't show currently*
## Here's some useful tricks to get you started:
template_default.footer: 🔻 Use the buttons down below to get started 🔻

fields.name: # Discord
value: - **`\$USERNAME`** will be replaced with your user/display name
- **`\$USER_AVATAR`** will be replaced with your avatar's URL
- **`\$BOT_AVATAR`** will be replaced with the bot's avatar URL

fields.name: # Calendar
value: - **`\$YEAR`** or **`\$year`** will be replaced with the current year
- **`\$MONTH`** or **`\$month`** will be replaced with the current month
- **`\$DAY`** or **`\$day`** will be replaced with the current day

```Hello! It is time for 📦 PACK SHUFFLE
Here are the sets available for this week!```
> `000` `🃏` **GROUP** - SINGLE `100%`
> `000` `🃏` **GROUP** - SINGLE `100%`

**Just head over to `/shop` and use dropdown menu to ITEM PACKS**
I hope you manage to drop your desired card!.. And do not gamble too too much!
```Make sure you read Content before buying any of the packs, they are all different based on their price etc..```
`🔎` **NEW QUEST**
> You can now also use `/quest` to check new set of quests. Hope everyone have fun doing them.

```Hello everyone! 💕
We have EVENT_NAME dropping today! I hope everyone enjoy the set and manages to finish successfully.```
`⭐` **EVENT_NAME**
> `Contains: SETS`

Use `/drop:🎆 Event 1` and `/drop:🎆 Event 2` to get EVENT_NAME cards! The cooldown is of 6 hours and it will end DAY MONTH.

```Hello everyone! 💕```
`🃏` ***WEEKLY CARD GIVEAWAY***
> React `🎁` to participate!

`📜` ***QUEST UPDATE***
> You can now check `/quest` to see new set of objectives available to do.

`⚠️` ***INVITE LINK***
> https://discord.gg/G4YHSMNZQp

`📝` ***CUSTOMS ARE CLOSED***
> They'll be given next week!

```Here is a new poll of the week.
Theme is: A New Shop Set```
:1one: **OPTION** :: DESCRIPTION
:2two: **OPTION** :: DESCRIPTION
:3three: **OPTION** :: DESCRIPTION
:4four: **OPTION** :: DESCRIPTION
